text: Terence Hallinan (December 4, 1936 â€“ January 17, 2020) was an American attorney and politician. He was born in San Francisco, California. He was the 26th District Attorney of San Francisco from 1996 through 2004. Hallinan was defeated in the next election for DA by Kamala Harris. Hallinan was a member of the Democratic Party. Hallinan died on January 17, 2020 in San Francisco at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Zamora, Jim Herron. HALLINAN: A man at odds with authority. San Francisco Chronicle. Published Wednesday, December 10, 2003. Accessed May 29, 2006. title: Terence Hallinan
